title: NYT Connections Clone
summary: An unlimited-guess version of NYT Connections that removes the four-strike limit. Built with FastAPI, SQLite, and vanilla JavaScript, it includes a calendar widget for browsing historical puzzles. Perfect for learning the categories you'd otherwise never see.

title: Wordle Recreation
summary: A one-day build recreating Wordle with quality of life improvements: calendar widget for browsing any historical puzzle from June 2021 onwards, click any tile to edit instead of just the last one. Built with FastAPI and vanilla JavaScript using AI-assisted development.

title: Ontario Building Code RAG
summary: A Retrieval-Augmented Generation system that transforms searching the 800,000-word Ontario Building Code from 10-30 minute keyword searches into instant, conversational queries. Features intelligent query expansion, accurate citations, and real-time token tracking. Self-serve with user's OpenAI API key.
